'''Invulnerable Maid-Knight''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[A Knight's Journey Through Liyue]].''

==Trivia==
*The Japanese and Chinese names of the achievement are a reference to a Japanese light novel series {{w|Unbreakable Machine-Doll}} (機巧少女は傷つかない, ''Mashin Dooru wa Kizutsukanai'' or ''Kikou Shoujo wa Kizutsukanai'').
